Class Rover

  • java.lang.Object
    • libary.Rover

  • public class Rover
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is representation of our rover.
    Author:
    Jos Mutter

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rover(Wheel wheelLeft, Wheel wheelRight)
      Initialises the object with two wheels.
      Rover(Wheel wheelLeft, Wheel wheelRight, ColorEye colorEye)
      Initialises the object with two wheels and a color sensor.
      Rover(Wheel wheelLeft, Wheel wheelRight, SonarEye sonarEye)
      Initialises the object with two wheels and a sonar sensor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void moveBackward()
      Moves the rover backwards indefinitely.
      void moveForward()
      Moves the rover indefinitely forward
      void smallTurnLeft(double degree)
      Makes a turn to the left with both wheels.
      void smallTurnRight(double degree)
      Makes a turn to the right with both wheels.
      void stop()
      Stops the rover from any movement.
      void turnLeft(double degree)
      Makes a turn to the left with one wheel.
      void turnRight(double degree)
      Makes a turn to the right with one wheel.

        Moves the rover indefinitely forward

      • moveBackward

        public void stop()
        Stops the rover from any movement.

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight(double degree)
        Makes a turn to the right with one wheel.
        Parameters:
        degree - The amount of the degree you want to turn. Keep it within 1 and 360. More is still possible.

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft(double degree)
        Makes a turn to the left with one wheel.
        Parameters:
        degree - The amount of the degree you want to turn. Keep it within 1 and 360. More is still possible.

      • smallTurnRight

        public void smallTurnRight(double degree)
        Makes a turn to the right with both wheels. This will turn the rover on the same spot.
        Parameters:
        degree - The amount of the degree you want to turn. Keep it within 1 and 360. More is still possible.

      • smallTurnLeft

        public void smallTurnLeft(double degree)
        Makes a turn to the left with both wheels. This will turn the rover on the same spot.
        Parameters:
        degree - The amount of the degree you want to turn. Keep it within 1 and 360. More is still possible.
